content: reminiscent of picket fences this simple textured washcloth is perfect for all skill levels **size ** approximately 7in/18cm square **needles ** i used 4 5mm us size 7 straight needles **gauge ** approximately 4 5 stitches per inch **notions ** tapestry needle **yarn ** the sample i made used knit picks dishie worsted weight 4 ply 190 yards per 100g skein 100% cotton in the colorway jalapeno any worsted weight yarn in 100% cotton will work for this project you will need around 40 yards or 20g per washcloth **notes ** the size and stitch count of the washcloth can be easily modified just add or remove stitches in increments of two cotton sheds fibers the first time it touches water so make sure you launder your washcloth before use **skills needed ** perfect for beginners this simple pattern utilizes knitting purling
